name: Quacktum Physic
text: If "Quantum Duck" is on the field you can activate this card, then flip a coin and if it is Heads, activate one of these effects. If it is Tails, destroy all monsters you control.·Special Summon "Schrodinger's Duck" from your hand, Deck, or GY ignoring summoning conditions.·You can add 1 "Duck" card from your Deck or GY to your hand.·"Duck" monsters you currently control cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects until the end of this turn.
